channel.title: Diagramming on Partially Attended
channel.description: Recent content in Diagramming on Partially Attended

item.title: Some ruminations on software architecture and diagramming
item.description: So Pat Kua recently tweeted: UML failed so here we have AML (Arbitrary Modeling Language) https://t.co/BnbgC8ZHTD — Pat Kua (@patkua) November 9, 2018<_a><_blockquote> and this got me thinking about the worries I’ve had about not doing “diagramming” right, but the above tweet led me to read a ton of really interesting posts on software architecting. Bottom line is, as with so many things, pick the artefact that fits the purpose and the audience.
